headline: Evaluating CME Group (CME) After 24 7 Crypto Derivatives Trading Announcement
summary: CME Group (CME) is back in focus after announcing plans to run its cryptocurrency futures and options trading 24/7 from May 29, 2026, pending regulatory approval, aligning its schedule with always-on crypto markets. See our latest analysis for CME Group. The 24/7 crypto move lands after a busy start to 2026 for CME Group, with new single stock futures, additional crypto futures and an increased regular dividend. This comes alongside a 30 day share price return of 8.97% and a 1 year total...
